senses.sense_definition: Действительное причастие прошедшего времени несовершенного вида от глагола <w>прикидываться</w>

examples.text: Студент, <w>прикидывавшийся</w> больным, на самом деле просто не хотел идти на экзамен.

target_lang_translations.en: The student, <w>pretending</w> to be sick, actually just didn't want to go to the exam.

examples.text: Кот, всё это время <w>прикидывавшийся</w> спящим, внезапно открыл глаза и прыгнул.

target_lang_translations.en: The cat, who had been <w>feigning</w> sleep all this time, suddenly opened its eyes and jumped.

target_lang_definitions.en: Past active participle of the verb 'to pretend' or 'to feign'; describing someone who was creating a false appearance or acting like someone else.

en.target_lang_sense_clarification: acting so as to make it appear that something is the case when in fact it is not
simulating a physical or mental state (e.g., illness, sleep)
playing a role or behaving like a specific type of person (e.g., acting the fool)
